attributes.action: Parties to issue a manifesto on Israel Palestine conflict and conflicts of interest prior to General Election 2015
attributes.additional_details: All political parties to publish an easy to access clear statement to the Electorate prior to the next General Election outlining their stance towards the Israel Palestine conflict and the possible conflicts of interest that may be in place from Donors and Lobbying Groups on both sides. This will enable me, a UK voter, to make an informed decision on where to place my vote.
